TestCase.author: Noname
TestCase.Description: Create Item of Item Type SampleMetadata, created in 'Setup Test.xml'

Request.Comments: Create a new item of SampleMetadata item type Select Quality Innovator/SampleMetadata item type in main tree and create a new item (click 'Create a New Item' icon on main toolbar). Fill in 'prop_str' field (enter, for example, 'test_prop_str'). Save/Unlock and Close the item
